metadata.description:
Sometimes you have wishes and dreams that you want to come true and you fear that they will not come true. At this very point, you are working so that your wish does not exist. You are radiating frequency in the opposite direction. However, all you have to do is think about making your wish come true. How would you feel if that dream came true? Starting from such a thought, you can activate your heart and radiate positive vibrations. Otherwise, you will experience feelings of fear and anxiety, and you will radiate vibrations in the opposite direction.

Now think of a dream that you believe is possible and possible, and send powerful signals to the universe with your heart, imagining how you will feel when it comes true. The universe is waiting to work generously for all of us.

Believe with love...
metadata.name: Universal Vibrations #1/308
